io.github.nucleuspowered.nucleus.api.rtp

Interface RTPKernel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CatalogType

    @CatalogedBy(value=RTPKernels.class)
public interface RTPKernel
extends CatalogType
    An RTPKernel provides the instructions for how to select a location when using RTP.

    RTPKernels can be registered in the appropriate registry.

    Kernels can base logic on a supplied location, but are expected to handle cases where a null or invalid location is supplied.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Gets a new location.

    • Method Detail

      • getLocation

        Optional<Location<World>> getLocation(@Nullable
                                      Location<World> currentLocation,
                                      World target,
                                      NucleusRTPService.RTPOptions options)
        Gets a new location.

        Note that this may fail if the search times out. This does not indicate a failing routine.

        Parameters:
        currentLocation - The current location of the entity to teleport, if appropriate
        target - The target world for teleport
        options - The options to consider when teleporting
        Returns:
        The location to teleport to, if any.
